questions.question: He cleaned his room ___ washed the dishes afterwards.
questions.explanation: 同じ種類の出来事や情報をつなぐときは and を使います。

questions.question: We visited the museum ___ took many pictures.
questions.explanation: 同じ種類の出来事や情報をつなぐときは and を使います。

questions.question: She wrote the report ___ sent it to the teacher.
questions.explanation: 同じ種類の出来事や情報をつなぐときは and を使います。

questions.question: My brother cooked dinner ___ set the table.
questions.explanation: 同じ種類の出来事や情報をつなぐときは and を使います。

questions.question: The wind was strong ___ the rain was cold.
questions.explanation: 同じ種類の出来事や情報をつなぐときは and を使います。

questions.question: The students studied hard ___ they passed the test.
questions.explanation: 同じ種類の出来事や情報をつなぐときは and を使います。

questions.question: I bought some apples ___ made a pie for dessert.
questions.explanation: 同じ種類の出来事や情報をつなぐときは and を使います。

questions.question: They planted flowers ___ watered the garden every day.
questions.explanation: 同じ種類の出来事や情報をつなぐときは and を使います。

questions.question: I wanted to go hiking ___ it started to rain.
questions.explanation: 対立する内容を並べるときは but を使います。

questions.question: She practiced very hard ___ she didn't win the game.
questions.explanation: 対立する内容を並べるときは but を使います。

questions.question: He likes math ___ his brother prefers English.
questions.explanation: 対立する内容を並べるときは but を使います。

questions.question: We planned a picnic ___ the park was closed.
questions.explanation: 対立する内容を並べるときは but を使います。

questions.question: My sister is shy ___ she loves singing on stage.
questions.explanation: 対立する内容を並べるときは but を使います。

questions.question: The book looked difficult ___ it was easy to read.
questions.explanation: 対立する内容を並べるときは but を使います。

questions.question: I brought an umbrella ___ I didn't need to use it.
questions.explanation: 対立する内容を並べるときは but を使います。

questions.question: They wanted to play outside ___ it was already dark.
questions.explanation: 対立する内容を並べるときは but を使います。

questions.question: Would you like tea ___ would you prefer coffee.
questions.explanation: 選択肢を示すときは or を使います。

questions.question: We can go by train ___ we can take the bus.
questions.explanation: 選択肢を示すときは or を使います。

questions.question: Do you want to study now ___ do you want to review later.
questions.explanation: 選択肢を示すときは or を使います。

questions.question: Shall we watch a movie ___ shall we play board games.
questions.explanation: 選択肢を示すときは or を使います。

questions.question: He must choose soccer club ___ join the music club.
questions.explanation: 選択肢を示すときは or を使います。

questions.question: You can read a book ___ listen to music quietly.
questions.explanation: 選択肢を示すときは or を使います。

questions.question: Should I call him ___ send him a message.
questions.explanation: 選択肢を示すときは or を使います。

questions.question: Do you want curry ___ do you want pasta.
questions.explanation: 選択肢を示すときは or を使います。

questions.question: It was raining hard, ___ we stayed at home.
questions.explanation: 原因の結果を述べるときは so を使います。

questions.question: She forgot her notebook, ___ I lent her mine.
questions.explanation: 原因の結果を述べるときは so を使います。

questions.question: He studied every night, ___ he passed the exam.
questions.explanation: 原因の結果を述べるときは so を使います。

questions.question: The movie was very popular, ___ all the tickets sold out.
questions.explanation: 原因の結果を述べるときは so を使います。

questions.question: The road was icy, ___ they drove very slowly.
questions.explanation: 原因の結果を述べるときは so を使います。

questions.question: The alarm didn't ring, ___ he was late for school.
questions.explanation: 原因の結果を述べるときは so を使います。

questions.question: The cake looked delicious, ___ everyone wanted a slice.
questions.explanation: 原因の結果を述べるときは so を使います。

questions.question: We were hungry, ___ we cooked pasta.
questions.explanation: 原因の結果を述べるときは so を使います。

questions.question: We stayed home ___ it was snowing heavily.
questions.explanation: 理由を述べるときは because を使います。

questions.question: She went to bed early ___ she was very tired.
questions.explanation: 理由を述べるときは because を使います。

questions.question: He was absent ___ he caught a cold.
questions.explanation: 理由を述べるときは because を使います。

questions.question: They enjoyed the trip ___ the weather was perfect.
questions.explanation: 理由を述べるときは because を使います。

questions.question: I couldn't read the menu ___ it was in French.
questions.explanation: 理由を述べるときは because を使います。

questions.question: We had to hurry ___ the train was leaving soon.
questions.explanation: 理由を述べるときは because を使います。

questions.question: She was late ___ the bus broke down.
questions.explanation: 理由を述べるときは because を使います。

questions.question: He is famous ___ he writes inspiring novels.
questions.explanation: 理由を述べるときは because を使います。

questions.question: ___ it rains tomorrow, we will cancel the match.
questions.explanation: 「もし〜なら」という条件を表すときは if を使います。

questions.question: ___ you study hard, you will improve.
questions.explanation: 「もし〜なら」という条件を表すときは if を使います。

questions.question: ___ he calls you, please tell me.
questions.explanation: 「もし〜なら」という条件を表すときは if を使います。

questions.question: ___ we finish early, let's play basketball.
questions.explanation: 「もし〜なら」という条件を表すときは if を使います。

questions.question: ___ you feel sick, go to the nurse's office.
questions.explanation: 「もし〜なら」という条件を表すときは if を使います。

questions.question: ___ the store is closed, we will come back later.
questions.explanation: 「もし〜なら」という条件を表すときは if を使います。

questions.question: ___ she forgets her homework, the teacher will be angry.
questions.explanation: 「もし〜なら」という条件を表すときは if を使います。

questions.question: ___ you see Ken, ask him about the schedule.
questions.explanation: 「もし〜なら」という条件を表すときは if を使います。

questions.question: Call me ___ you arrive at the station.
questions.explanation: 「〜するとき」には when を使います。

questions.question: Wash your hands ___ you get home.
questions.explanation: 「〜するとき」には when を使います。

questions.question: He was reading ___ I visited him.
questions.explanation: 「〜するとき」には when を使います。

questions.question: She smiled ___ she saw the present.
questions.explanation: 「〜するとき」には when を使います。

questions.question: We were nervous ___ the test began.
questions.explanation: 「〜するとき」には when を使います。

questions.question: They cheered ___ their team scored.
questions.explanation: 「〜するとき」には when を使います。

questions.question: I was surprised ___ he spoke Japanese fluently.
questions.explanation: 「〜するとき」には when を使います。

questions.question: Take notes ___ you listen to the explanation.
questions.explanation: 「〜するとき」には when を使います。

questions.question: She was studying ___ her brother was playing games.
questions.explanation: 同時進行を表すときは while を使います。

questions.question: He listened to music ___ he was riding the train.
questions.explanation: 同時進行を表すときは while を使います。

questions.question: They talked quietly ___ the teacher was writing on the board.
questions.explanation: 同時進行を表すときは while を使います。

questions.question: I was cooking ___ my sister was setting the table.
questions.explanation: 同時進行を表すときは while を使います。

questions.question: We waited ___ the doctor was examining the patient.
questions.explanation: 同時進行を表すときは while を使います。

questions.question: The children were laughing ___ they played in the park.
questions.explanation: 同時進行を表すときは while を使います。

questions.question: The lights went out ___ we were watching a movie.
questions.explanation: 同時進行を表すときは while を使います。

questions.question: He took notes ___ the speaker was explaining the plan.
questions.explanation: 同時進行を表すときは while を使います。

questions.question: Brush your teeth ___ you go to bed.
questions.explanation: 「〜する前に」には before を使います。

questions.question: Check your answers ___ you submit the test.
questions.explanation: 「〜する前に」には before を使います。

questions.question: She reviews her notes ___ she starts a new lesson.
questions.explanation: 「〜する前に」には before を使います。

questions.question: We took a photo ___ we entered the museum.
questions.explanation: 「〜する前に」には before を使います。

questions.question: He warms up ___ he runs a marathon.
questions.explanation: 「〜する前に」には before を使います。

questions.question: Call me ___ you leave school.
questions.explanation: 「〜する前に」には before を使います。

questions.question: They practice ___ they perform on stage.
questions.explanation: 「〜する前に」には before を使います。

questions.question: I always stretch ___ I go jogging.
questions.explanation: 「〜する前に」には before を使います。

questions.question: We ate dinner ___ we finished our homework.
questions.explanation: 「〜した後で」には after を使います。

questions.question: She took a nap ___ she completed the project.
questions.explanation: 「〜した後で」には after を使います。

questions.question: They went to a cafe ___ they watched the movie.
questions.explanation: 「〜した後で」には after を使います。

questions.question: I will call you ___ I arrive home.
questions.explanation: 「〜した後で」には after を使います。

questions.question: He washed the car ___ he played soccer.
questions.explanation: 「〜した後で」には after を使います。

questions.question: We cleaned the classroom ___ the class was over.
questions.explanation: 「〜した後で」には after を使います。

questions.question: She listened to music ___ she practiced piano.
questions.explanation: 「〜した後で」には after を使います。

questions.question: They relaxed ___ they finished the marathon.
questions.explanation: 「〜した後で」には after を使います。

questions.question: He waited ___ the last train arrived.
questions.explanation: 「〜するまで」には until を使います。

questions.question: We studied ___ the bell rang.
questions.explanation: 「〜するまで」には until を使います。

questions.question: She worked ___ midnight.
questions.explanation: 「〜するまで」には until を使います。

questions.question: They talked ___ the cafe closed.
questions.explanation: 「〜するまで」には until を使います。

questions.question: I will stay here ___ you come back.
questions.explanation: 「〜するまで」には until を使います。

questions.question: Keep practicing ___ you can do it smoothly.
questions.explanation: 「〜するまで」には until を使います。

questions.question: The store stayed open ___ everyone finished shopping.
questions.explanation: 「〜するまで」には until を使います。

questions.question: He kept trying ___ he solved the problem.
questions.explanation: 「〜するまで」には until を使います。

questions.question: ___ she was tired, she kept studying.
questions.explanation: 「〜だけれども」を表すときは although を使います。

questions.question: ___ it was late, they continued playing chess.
questions.explanation: 「〜だけれども」を表すときは although を使います。

questions.question: ___ he is young, he speaks like an adult.
questions.explanation: 「〜だけれども」を表すときは although を使います。

questions.question: ___ the road was narrow, the bus passed safely.
questions.explanation: 「〜だけれども」を表すときは although を使います。

questions.question: ___ it was raining, the runners kept going.
questions.explanation: 「〜だけれども」を表すときは although を使います。

questions.question: ___ I practice a lot, I still get nervous.
questions.explanation: 「〜だけれども」を表すときは although を使います。

questions.question: ___ she failed once, she didn't give up.
questions.explanation: 「〜だけれども」を表すときは although を使います。

questions.question: ___ the weather was terrible, the festival was fun.
questions.explanation: 「〜だけれども」を表すときは although を使います。

questions.question: You can't go out ___ you finish your homework.
questions.explanation: 「〜しない限り」という条件には unless を用います。

questions.question: The alarm won't stop ___ you press this button.
questions.explanation: 「〜しない限り」という条件には unless を用います。

questions.question: We can't leave ___ everyone arrives.
questions.explanation: 「〜しない限り」という条件には unless を用います。

questions.question: He won't succeed ___ he keeps trying.
questions.explanation: 「〜しない限り」という条件には unless を用います。
